alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 1:26PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Across Idaho, the strongest winds are expected east of Boise. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers Tuesday afternoon may result in reduced visibility and increased travel hazard.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
